num.title: Message counter
num.description: Ever increasing counter of messages, which counts from zero at start-up.

timestamp.title: Timestamp
timestamp.description: Time since epoch in seconds (Unix time).

dpaQueueLen.title: DPA queue length
dpaQueueLen.description: Length of pending DPA transaction queue (16 is maximum).

dpaChannelState.title: DPA channel state
dpaChannelState.description: State (Ready/NotReady/ExclusiveAccess) of DPA channel - one of USB CDC, SPI or UART interface.

msgQueueLen.title: Message queue length
msgQueueLen.description: Length of pending API msg queue (32 is maximum).
